originalTitle: Saif al-Islam Gaddafi, son of ex-Libyan leader, reportedly shot dead
title: Saif al-Islam Gaddafi, son of ex-Libyan leader, reportedly shot dead
content: The 53-year-old, who was once widely seen as the second most powerful person in Libya, was killed on Tuesday according to Libyan media.

originalTitle: Somali woman executed for murdering a child in a case that sparked outrage
title: Somali woman executed for murdering a child in a case that sparked outrage
content: Hodan Mohamud Diiriye faced a firing squad after being found guilty of beating Saabirin Saylaan to death.

originalTitle: South Sudan's leader sacks aides after dead man appointed
title: South Sudan's leader sacks aides after dead man appointed
content: The appointment of a dead opposition politician to a presidential panel caused embarrassment.

originalTitle: Sudan’s military breaks through years-long RSF blockade in Kadugli
title: Sudan’s military breaks through years-long RSF blockade in Kadugli
content: Sudanese military officials say they’ve broken through a siege by the Rapid Support Forces (RSF) in Kadugli.

originalTitle: Saif al-Islam Gaddafi, son of Libyan former leader, killed
title: Saif al-Islam Gaddafi, son of Libyan former leader, killed
content: Saif al-Islam Gaddafi, son of former Libyan leader Muammar Gaddafi, has been killed in Libya, Al Jazeera Arabic reports.

originalTitle: ‘Game is over’: Iran’s ex-leaders, hardliners clash after protest killings
title: ‘Game is over’: Iran’s ex-leaders, hardliners clash after protest killings
content: A former reformist leader wants the Islamic Republic gone while lawmakers wish to see an ex-president executed.

originalTitle: Thousands of Epstein documents taken down after victims identified
title: Thousands of Epstein documents taken down after victims identified
content: The US Department of Justice faces criticism from victims after names and unredacted images included in latest release.

originalTitle: US says it shot down Iranian drone flying towards aircraft carrier
title: US says it shot down Iranian drone flying towards aircraft carrier
content: A US military spokesman says the drone was shot down while approaching an American vessel in the Arabian Sea.

originalTitle: Watch: BBC joins Colombian commandos fighting 'never-ending battle' against drug gangs
title: Watch: BBC joins Colombian commandos fighting 'never-ending battle' against drug gangs
content: As the US and Colombian presidents meet, Orla Guerin joins a police unit tasked with finding and destroying jungle cocaine labs.

originalTitle: The talented playmaker no-one seems to want
title: The talented playmaker no-one seems to want
content: Harvey Elliott is one of England's most gifted young players - but neither Aston Villa or Liverpool appear to rate the midfielder.

originalTitle: Has the January transfer window always felt flat?
title: Has the January transfer window always felt flat?
content: With just seven Premier League deals done on transfer deadline day, has the winter transfer window become a damp squib?

originalTitle: Mateta faces uncertain future for club and country
title: Mateta faces uncertain future for club and country
content: BBC Sport looks at what next for Jean-Philippe Mateta after his dream move to AC Milan broke down over issues with his medical
